fields.description:
When deciding how an app should handle an incoming Android Intent, knowing the type, action, and data values that were sent with the Intent are critical. 

when  i share image from gallery ,intent  value always null. 

getData() always equals null also this one getType() and getAction()
fields.summary: Image intent Filter always null in android

comments.body:
Hi,

We tried to reproduce this issue with a sample test case. Itâ€™s working as expected with Titanium SDK 3.3.0. Please try the sample code and let us know if the problem persists.
 
h4. Testing Environment:
 
Ti CLI 3.3.0
Titanium SDK: SDK 3.3.0
Android Device
 
h4. Test Code
 
Use the Project file given above, load it to Titanium, Run the project in an android device.
 
h4. Steps to Test

- Import the project in titanium
- Run the project in an android Device
- To view image from gallery first select an image by long clicking on it
- Select 'share' from the intent list.
- Select the app from the applist.
 
h4. Expected Result
 
Your app will be viewed displaying the image.
